input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 108'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland'
  - Name='The Twillery Co. Soperton 6' Christmas Garland with 50 Warm Lights and Timer (Set of'
  - Name='Santa's Workshop Mixed Pine Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Pre-Lit Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='The Twillery Co. Perego Fir Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Antique Fir Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='The Twillery Co. Soperton Pre-Lit Snow Flocked Christmas Garland with 35 Warm Lights and'
  - Name='Creative Co-Op Pinecones Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 115'' in. Lighted Faux No Plant Species Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Winchester Pine Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='2 Pcs Christmas Norfolk Pine Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Wintry Berry Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Kalaila Lighted Christmas Balls and Berries Pre-Decorated Artificial Magnolia'
  - Name='Northlight Pre-Lit Decorated Pine Cone & Berries Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Artificial Colorful Garland'
  - Name='Sterling Tree Company Norway Pine Artificial Christmas Tree Set of 4'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 24" Mountain Pine Flocked Wreath with LED Lights'
  - Name='Northlight Northern Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Vickerman 9' x 16" Flocked Alaskan Garland LED'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 72" Artificial Mixed Frosted Berry Twig Pine Cone & Pine Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 50' x 10" Pre-Lit Canadian Pine Commercial Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='NorthLight Windsor Green Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Puleo International 6 ft. Red Berry Garland with 160 Warm White Twinkle LED Lights'
  - Name='Northlight 6'x8" Pre-Lit Decorated Burgundy and Gold Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9' Magnolia Mix Pine Garland with LED Lights and Bows'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 108'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is a lighted faux pine garland similar in function and structure, likely with LED lights and pine needle design, making it highly relevant to the pre-lit Carolina Pine garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Twillery Co. Soperton 6' Christmas Garland with 50 Warm Lights and Timer (Set of
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This garland features warm lights and is a Christmas garland, but shorter length and possibly fewer decorative details than reference; still relevant as a pre-lit pine garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santa's Workshop Mixed Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A mixed pine garland but no indication of lighting or pre-lit features, lowering relevancy compared to the lit, detailed reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Pre-Lit Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a pre-lit Canadian pine garland similar in category and features to the reference which is Carolina pine, making it very relevant due to similar use and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Twillery Co. Perego Fir Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An artificial fir garland but no mention of lights or pre-lit feature; relevant in type but less so in features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Antique Fir Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar in type to the reference as an artificial fir garland, but no lights mentioned which reduces relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Twillery Co. Soperton Pre-Lit Snow Flocked Christmas Garland with 35 Warm Lights and
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit with warm lights and a garland, similar in features although flocked surface differs; still relevant conceptually.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Creative Co-Op Pinecones Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Garland with pinecones like reference, but no mention of lighting or detailed pine branch type, so moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 115'' in. Lighted Faux No Plant Species Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighted garland but no specific plant species indicated, making its materials and look less clearly related to the pine garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Winchester Pine Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pine garland with lights, similar in function and style to the reference product, very relevant in category and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 2 Pcs Christmas Norfolk Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Norfolk Pine garland similar in pine type and general use but no mention of lights reduces relevance slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Wintry Berry Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Garland with lights but focus on berries, differing from pure pine garland; somewhat relevant but secondary focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Kalaila Lighted Christmas Balls and Berries Pre-Decorated Artificial Magnolia
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-decorated magnolia-based garland with balls and berries, distinct in plant type and decoration, less relevant to pine garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Pre-Lit Decorated Pine Cone & Berries Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland with pine cones and berries overlaps with reference in lighting and pine cone decoration, slightly less pure pine focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Artificial Colorful Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Colorful garland likely emphasizing decoration more than pine garland construction; low relevance to the reference pine garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sterling Tree Company Norway Pine Artificial Christmas Tree Set of 4
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree set, not garland; different silhouette and use, so not relevant despite being pine.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 24" Mountain Pine Flocked Wreath with LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wreath shape differs from garland and shorter size; while some LED lights and pine are shared, overall product form is different.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Northern Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A northern pine artificial garland aligns closely with the reference in terms of plant type and product function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 9' x 16" Flocked Alaskan Garland LED
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit flocked garland of similar length, but specific pine type not stated and flocking adds surface difference, moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 72" Artificial Mixed Frosted Berry Twig Pine Cone & Pine Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Mixed materials including pine cones and berries with lights, but shorter length and more mixed decoration reduce direct relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 50' x 10" Pre-Lit Canadian Pine Commercial Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Large pre-lit Canadian pine garland similar in make and function to the reference Carolina pine garland, very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: NorthLight Windsor Green Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial pine garland similar in type and function to the reference, although no lighting mentioned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 6 ft. Red Berry Garland with 160 Warm White Twinkle LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Garland with red berries and lots of LED lights; different plant focus from pine but similar lighting feature, moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6'x8" Pre-Lit Decorated Burgundy and Gold Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine garland with decorative elements, similar type and lighting but different decoration style, relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9' Magnolia Mix Pine Garland with LED Lights and Bows
scores_with_rationales.rationale: From same brand with LED lights and pine elements mixed with magnolia and bows; similar structure but mixed plant types reduce direct relevancy.
